permission in modern American English
there isn't a difference
most people use them the same way so
when people ask this question should I

there won't be a communication problem
we use them the same way most people do
however however originally may was used

so sometimes you may meet people who are

they still want to use may for

can I use your computer in other words

because may sounds polite may sounds a
